breakfast.name: eggs and toast
breakfast.notes: Fried, scrambled, you really can't go wrong.

breakfast.name: cold cereal
breakfast.notes: Doesn't get much simpler than this.

breakfast.name: fruit smoothie
breakfast.notes: Good berries include strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries. This can be frozen and re-blended later.

breakfast.name: avocado toast with egg
breakfast.notes: Toast bread, then mash avocado on top, then set fried egg on top of both.

breakfast.name: quiche
breakfast.notes: For now, buy entire quiche from store. Cooking times vary between 20 and 45 minutes.

breakfast.name: omelets
breakfast.notes: Mushrooms might work well also if they are small (and cooked.)

breakfast.name: scrambled eggs with ham and cheese

snacks.name: hard boiled eggs
snacks.notes: Getting an egg poacher would help.

snacks.name: berries and yogurt
ingredients: blueberries or strawberries or raspberries or banana
snacks.notes: Crunch up the granola on top. No, banana is not a berry.

snacks.name: pickles
snacks.notes: For the love of all that is holy, ensure these are dill.

snacks.name: cheese and crackers
ingredients: goat or pepperjack or bree cheese
snacks.notes: Goat cheese drizzled in Balsamic vinegar would be good too.

snacks.name: potstickers
snacks.notes: Purchase these frozen from the store.

snacks.name: apple slices and cheese
ingredients: mozzarella or cheddar or pepperjack or bree cheese

snacks.name: gourmet bread and olive oil and vinegar
snacks.notes: Anything but the cheapest balsamic should be fine. Good garlic bread can replace artisan bread in a pinch.

snacks.name: avocado with salt
snacks.notes: Cut avocado into slices and salt individually.

snacks.name: quesadilla
snacks.notes: If apples slices and chicken are involved, it'll be more like a full meal.

snacks.name: steamed broccoli
snacks.notes: This could also work well with Cauliflower but you might need a different cheese. Consider salting either.

snacks.name: faux trail mix
snacks.notes: Only use pine nuts if they are on sale. Those things are pricey.

lunch.name: chili and cheese
ingredients: pepperjack or colbyjack or cheddar cheese

lunch.name: grilled cheese and tomato soup
ingredients: cheddar or colbyjack or pepperjack cheese
lunch.notes: Make sure to use extra cheese in place of butter on outside of sandwich. Gouda can work well but will be challenging to melt.

lunch.name: peanut butter and nutella sandwich
lunch.notes: Consider eating peanuts on the side to manage hunger better.

lunch.name: peanut butter and jelly sandwich
lunch.notes: Consider eating peanuts on the side to manage hunger better.

lunch.name: turkey bacon avocado sandwich
ingredients: (optional) provolone or pepperjack or gouda cheese

lunch.name: ham, bacon, cheddar sandwich
lunch.notes: Use multiple slices of cheese or a very thick single slice.

lunch.name: chicken, bacon, ranch sandwich
ingredients: provolone or mozzarella or pepperjack or cheddar or gouda cheese
lunch.notes: Use multiple slices of cheese or a very thick single slice.

lunch.name: roast beef and pickle sandwich
ingredients: cheddar or pepperjack or colbyjack cheese
lunch.notes: Purchase tiny dill pickles and halve them. The pre-halved variety aren't as tasty. Reduce mayo if dijon is used.

lunch.name: hot pockets and veggies
ingredients: carrots + ranch or cooked spinach + salt or sliced bell peppers
lunch.notes: Pizza hot pockets are always a safe bet

lunch.name: frozen pizza and side dish
ingredients: carrots + ranch or granny smith apple slices or cooked broccoli + salt

dinner.name: pasta, sausage and mushrooms
dinner.notes: Attempt to avoid Pesto pasta as it makes for a weird flavor profile.

dinner.name: homemade pizza
dinner.notes: It is best to slice the olives into halves if they aren't already.

dinner.name: porkchops with roasted apples and onions (involved)
herb-garlic crusted flank steak with pan-roasted grapes (involved)
ingredients: crumbled feta cheese (substitution for 'blue' in recipe)

dinner.name: taco salad
ingredients: colbyjack or pepperjack or cheddar cheese

dinner.name: burgers
ingredients: colbyjack or pepperjack or cheddar or gouda cheese (sliced)
dinner.notes: Requires a skillet to melt cheese properly.

dinner.name: BBQ Sandwiches
ingredients: Shredded pork/beef/chicken already with BBQ sauce such as Jack Daniel's chicken
(optional) shredded meat and add BBQ sauce separately

dinner.name: Crockpot Beef Stew
